game.title: The Forbidden Relic
game.objective: Uncover the hidden relic in the cursed temple
game.description: You have been tasked by the village elder, ma'am Elara, to locate and retrieve a long-lost artifact from the temple. Your journey begins at the temple entrance.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and an enchanted amulet

task.objective: Acquire the temple entrance map from the library
task.description: Check the village archives for a detailed map guiding you to the temple entrance. Be cautious; it might be hidden away.
Prove your worth by solving a series of riddles at the temple entrance. Success will grant access.

task.objective: Explore the temple and retrieve the artifact
task.description: Beware of traps and undead spirits as you navigate through the temple's inner chambers to find the relic. Be quick, for it is guarded!
